# stopVPNTunnel()

**Instance Method**

Start the process of disconnecting the VPN.

## Declaration

```swift
func stopVPNTunnel()
```

## Discussion

This method returns immediately after starting the process of disconnecting the VPN. In order to be notified when the VPN is fully disconnected, register to observe the [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEVPNStatusDidChangeNotification] notification on the [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEVPNConnection] object and examine the status property when the notification is received.

## Controlling the VPN connection

- **startVPNTunnel()**: Start the process of connecting the VPN.
- **startVPNTunnel(options:)**: Start the process of connecting the VPN.
- **NEVPNConnectionStartOptionUsername**
- **NEVPNConnectionStartOptionPassword**
